description: Rollo Flamme is an 18-year-old, stoic, and diligent student at Noble Bell College with a strong sense of virtue and purity.  He is highly critical of others, particularly those who use magic, due to a past tragedy involving his brother.  Despite his stern demeanor, he harbors a deep love for Fleur City and its history, reflected in his admiration for Claude Frollo and the "Bell of Salvation."
